title: Does Instagram show your location? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is There a Chance Instagram Will Show Your Location If You Didn’t Tag It? While location tagging can be very useful, many users prefer not to give out this type of information. If you dislike sharing your location data, using Instagram can be daunting. So is there a chance of a data leak when you decide not to location tag your post? At the moment, your location is only visible if you want it to be. If you don’t tag it or mention it in your captions, nobody will know where you’re posting from. However, this wasn’t always true. If you’ve been on Instagram for a while, you may remember the Photo Map option. This map was visible from your profile page. It displayed your location even if your posts weren’t tagged with it. Because the function wasn’t widely used, Instagram quietly got rid of it. But it left an impression on Instagram users. There might be more changes in the future.

Instagram as an app knows your location if access has been given to the app however it doesnt show to the other users by default. When you upload a picture or a video and add location then the location is visible to others. Do thumbs up and follow back if this information helps. Thank you.
